meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>hedge</kanji> (or <kanji>fence</kanji>) <kanji>root</kanji> is where the hedge and fence grow from. What grows from this? Well, it's simply a <vocabulary>hedge</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>fence</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The readings are the kun'yomi readings of the kanji. With 垣 that's the one you learned and with 根 that's the vocab version of the kanji.
